header.title: Submit Your Research
header.description: Submit your research paper to our conference and be part of the global exchange of innovative ideas. We welcome original contributions in fields of information technology, offering an excellent platform to share your work with experts and professionals worldwide.

submission.title: Paper Submission
submission.description: We are excited to invite researchers, scientists, and innovators to submit their papers to the 2nd International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Sustainable Innovations in Technology (IC-SIT) 2026. This is an excellent opportunity to showcase your work to an international audience of experts, practitioners, and academics.
submission.stepsTitle: To submit your paper, please follow these simple steps:

steps.title: Prepare Your Manuscript
steps.description: Ensure your paper follows the submission guidelines outlined in the IEEE Conference Templates.

steps.title: Create an Account or Log In
steps.description: If you do not have an account on CMT, please sign up. Existing users can simply log in to proceed.

steps.title: Submit Your Paper
steps.description: Once logged in, follow the prompts to upload your paper and any supplementary materials, and provide the necessary details for review.

list.title: Paper Length
list.description: Up to 6 pages (including figures, tables & references), prepared in the two-column IEEE format.

list.title: Language
list.description: English only, with proper grammar and formatting.

list.title: Originality
list.description: Original unpublished research work with a novel contribution.

list.title: Similarity Index
list.description: Maximum similarity index should be less than 20%.

note: Note: The Microsoft CMT service was used for managing the peer-reviewing process for this conference. This service was provided for free by Microsoft and they bore all expenses, including costs for Azure cloud services as well as for software development and support.
